thread.title: EU capital Brussels plunged into darkness after massive power cut 'sparks terror attack fears'
thread.title_full: EU capital Brussels plunged into darkness after massive power cut 'sparks terror attack fears' - Mirror Online

author: mirror.co.uk
title: EU capital Brussels plunged into darkness after massive power cut 'sparks terror attack fears'
text:
EU capital Brussels plunged into darkness after massive power cut 'sparks terror attack fears' The loss of electricity across the Belgian capital has sparked terror attack fears, although the cause of the outage has not been confirmed   Share By Sam Adams 22:05, 9 FEB 2017 Updated 22:16, 9 FEB 2017 News   Share Get daily   Brussels has been plunged into darkness after a massive power cut.
The loss of electricity across the Belgian capital has sparked terror attack fears, although the cause of the outage has not been confirmed.
Belgium and other European countries are on high alert following several devastating terror attacks over the past 12 months.
Brussels is home to a number of key EU bodies, including the European Commission and European Council, both of which are situated in the centre of the city. 
Belgian security personnel ares reinforcing main sites across Brussels as the blackout causes transport chaos.
We'll be bringing you the very latest updates, pictures and video on this breaking news story.
